description: Welcome to Glenridge Estates, ideally located right across from Francis Park in the heart of Fleetwood! This beautifully updated corner-unit townhome offers approx 1,800 sq.ft. of modern living with 3 bedrooms and 2.5 baths. Featuring a large family room, updated kitchen with Whirlpool appliances, modern flooring, and sleek lighting throughout. Enjoy a spa-inspired ensuite with a soaker tub and frameless glass shower. Renovated in 2020, with major upgrades including Poly-B replaced, roof (2010), furnace replaced, and HWT (5 yrs). Complete with a double side-by-side garage and a private paved backyard with a palm treeâ€”all within walking distance to Francis Park, top schools, shops, restaurants, and the upcoming SkyTrain station!
